verbs.description: [ARG0: supreme court] [V: allows] [ARG1: states to collect sales taxes on more online transactions the supreme court upended the nation internet marketplace] [ARGM-PRD: ruling that many online retailers must collect and remit state sales] [ARGM-ADV: taxes the decision which overturns an earlier supreme court precedent will boost state revenues at the expense of consumers and sellers who have avoided sales taxes clarence thomas ruth bader ginsburg anthony kennedy neil gorsuch supreme court john roberts supreme court of the united states samuel alito united states congress jeff bezos dennis daugaard]

supreme court allows [ARG0: states] to [V: collect] [ARG1: sales taxes] [ARG2: on more online transactions] the supreme court upended the nation internet marketplace ruling that many online retailers must collect and remit state sales taxes the decision which overturns an earlier supreme court precedent will boost state revenues at the expense of consumers and sellers who have avoided sales taxes clarence thomas ruth bader ginsburg anthony kennedy neil gorsuch supreme court john roberts supreme court of the united states samuel alito united states congress jeff bezos dennis daugaard
